website_summaries.verdict: Surpasses the competitors in every way: installation ease, performance, customer support, and water quality.
pros: Remineralization process promotes optimal water quality
Detailed instructions for easy installation and water pressure remains unaffected
cons: Multiple components look daunting to install, but thorough instructions clear up confusion
Pricey, but it's an investment that pays for itself with great-tasting water

customer_reviews.title: The customer support is great. Talked to a guy one time on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a plumber or handyman, just a handy woman. Installed in about 3.5 hours including drilling the granite counter top (it was the longest part of the project). The customer support is great. Talked to a guy one time on the phone and couple times via email and he very patiently answered all my questions. I flushed the system 3 times and so far no leaks. Water tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: OS11

customer_reviews.title: Five-Star Rating for the Home Master TMHP HydroPerfection
customer_reviews.text: This system is excellent and well deserving of a five-star rating. It's quiet and efficient, and the water tastes great. You'll probably want to replace the faucet. I replaced the faucet with the KOHLER K-6666-VS Wellspring Beverage Faucet. Water tests of the tap water (Los Angeles) are as follows: total dissolved solids (TDS) of 334 ppm, PH of 7.74, and electrical conductivity (EC) of 670 uS/cm. After flushing through three to four tanks, the HydroPerfection system provides a TDS of 27 ppm, a PH of 7.86, and an EC of 53 uS/cm. Water tests were performed with the Hanna Instruments HI991300 pH/EC/TDS low range meter.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD WATER, BUT AMATURE MECHANICAL DESIGN
customer_reviews.text: The filter system works very well, but the cluster of mounting brackets which are suppose to hold the filters together is a joke. Very amateurish mechanical design. I just took the whole mess and stuck it in a plastic bucket under my sink. The installation directions make the hose 4 hose connections seem more complicated than they actually are. A simple hose connection diagram showing the 4 different color hoses would much better.
customer_reviews.author: LOU

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it. It’s horrible to install and is meh in quality.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible install instructions. Cost us an extra $200 on plumber fees to get this fully connected and not leaking. We had to purchase extra sealers. It was so frustrating. Don’t buy this crap. We kept it and overall it does work... after the insane install process and extra costs. We could have just bought a better system with the extra money, time, and frustration spent on this system.
customer_reviews.author: Monica R.

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to install. Instructions in the installation book not correct. Did not provide adequate parts. The faucet is cheap quality. Contd.... The Company reached out to me and apologized. I appreciate their kind gesture that they at least care and heard my voice. For good customer service I am changing the starts to 4/5.
customer_reviews.author: zubin j

customer_reviews.title: Amazing taste, makes great coffee and fills a glass fast!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set because of the remineralization and easy to change filters. Was pretty easy to install, I just had to buy an adapter instead of using the drain saddle due to my setup (garbage disposal didn't allow a proper mount of the saddle). Now that it is running, I can't believe I waited so long. My wife and I are very happy with the taste, performance and overall quality of the system. I've installed an inline TDS meter and I'm measuring ~45 supply (not bad!), ~1 pre-remineralization and then ~9-11 on the tap.
customer_reviews.author: wojo

customer_reviews.title: A worthwhile investment. We love having clean, crisp water on tap!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this filter to anyone who feels like they're at the mercy of a water delivery service. I spent years dealing with horrible customer service and constant price hikes. I look at this purchase as both a financial investmest as well as an investment in my health. According to my math the system will pay for itself after about a year and after that I will save an average of $250 per year even with the purchase of replacement filters annually. Setup was relatively easy and the water tastes excellent. Also helps the environment by eliminating your plastic bottle usage . It's a win-win, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fabio

customer_reviews.title: Best Tasting Water In The World!
customer_reviews.text: We've had our Home Master TMHP HydroPerfection RO system for a month now and all I can say is WOW! ... What great tasting water! We use it for cooking, making great tasting coffee, and I even use it in my CPAP machine which keeps me from having to buy distilled water at the store. One of the main reasons I chose the Home Master system over other brands is the 5 year warranty, compared to only 1 year for all the others I researched. I think it says something about the confidence a manufacturer places in the quality of their product when they're willing to warranty it for so long. You won't go wrong by choosing this system!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Henley

customer_reviews.title: Better than advertised !
customer_reviews.text: This filter system was easier to install than advertised. We were apprehensive about the other reviews cautioning about leaks or issues with low pressure, but to this date have experienced none of those issues. The list of tools and online process to install the filter system were exact in nature and comprehensive enough to follow easily. We are pleased and intend to purchase another system in the future for our parent's house under construction. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Emil

customer_reviews.title: Excelent water filtration systmem
customer_reviews.text: I have been using RO filtered water for few years, but with water refills. Try comparing taste of coffee or pasta cooked on tap water and RO water and you will understand me - tap water taste is much to be desired. Now I decided to install a water filtration system under my sink. After doing a long research I decided to install Home Master TMHP HydroPerfection water filtration system. It is a full featured quality RO system for a reasonable price. It provides healthy water of excellent taste. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Yury

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a solution to buying bottled water!
customer_reviews.text: I have used the under sink three compartment filtration system (not RO) for many years. The water usually was better tasting, but I always felt that we were still drinking impure water. I use the neti pot for colds and when I read about the woman who died using hers due to some kind of ameba, I took the leap and bought this system. I cannot tell you how wonderful it is. The taste is pure, clean and trustworthy. Took me about 3.5 hours to install (65 year old woman, but I am kind of handy) and I only had to go to the hardware store once! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: KLK

customer_reviews.title: The Clear Choice
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and the customer service AMAZING. It was quick and easy to install. My well water is not the most pleasant but after it goes through this system it is crystal clear, no smell and even better tasting then the bottled water. I had some concerns with the acidity of my water but a quick call to customer service and they shipped out a custom filter at no charge. It pours quickly and refills faster then expected. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: F&S

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't have installed by myself.
customer_reviews.text: I love my handy son. He did an awesome job installing this (but it wasn't easy by any means)! The water tastes great and I get plenty of pressure from the faucet. It really works and has been used constantly in my home (plants, coffee maker, ice cubes, drinks, etc) He had to remove an old sink sprayer to get a handy hole for the faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Filter System and customer service:)
customer_reviews.text: Home Master TMHP HydroPerfection Undersink Reverse Osmosis Water Filter System is awesome!!! Before purchasing the Home Master TMHP system, I did extensive research into the many reverse osmosis products on the market. Three years later I'm still very pleased with my purchase and the great customer service that comes along with the product. I love the taste of the water and quality which is on par with the so called best bottled water people pay for everyday minus the plastic containers.(I tested it myself) Once again thank you for your awesome water system and great customer service:)
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: arrived a day early and was fantastic in putting together. i had to YouTube the video on how to install since the instructions are kind of confusing. however it went together quite easily and i am looking forward to my new RO system. this one is replacing a Whirlpool one i had for 10 years which i bought locally. i like that this one will only need replacements once a year and that the replacement comes with new tubes and all the needed filters all together. a quick and easy replacement at a decent price since the Whirlpool filters had to be replaced every couple months and did not include new tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Joe

customer_reviews.title: The perfect water filtration system
customer_reviews.text: I have well water and have tried many types of filters to make my water taste better. This system not only produces all the drinking water I desire but it is the best tasting and healthiest I’ve ever experienced. It was simple to install, quiet and worth every penny of the investment. When I had questions I was treated with respect and curtesy by the perfect water staff. I will never use anyone else’s product since what I have now is truly PERFECT
customer_reviews.author: Martie

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water, great support and company
customer_reviews.text: After reading tons of reviews to which water filteration system I should invest in, perfect water was my decision. Based on the location of the company the many filters they have for each water filteration system and price point. During the installation I noticed one of the filters was leaking. I call support and they got a replacement part out very quickly. This company really cares about their customers and are very proud of their product. They have a great warranty and if something goes wrong or if help is needed support is available to help. And when you call them you are not gonna be talking to someone 3000 miles away, they are located in Arizona/USA.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Great water filter
customer_reviews.text: Just needed to get a water filter to upgrade the one from the fridge we always use. This filter was noticeably better tasting and even using a PPM meter it went from 250's to 30's when compared to the fridge filter...not surprised. Pushing the filter housing onto the hanging clips was a bit of a pain because they are REALLY tight but overall install was easy. You are going to need a 3rd outlet for the UV filter if you already have a disposal and dishwasher hooked up under FYI.
customer_reviews.author: K. Y.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious water!
customer_reviews.text: With a baby on the way I needed a filtered source of water to mix formula. I read around the internet and came across Home Master filters. I ordered the TMHP and installed it in my basement and ran lines up to sink and line to the fridge for ice. I’m pretty handy so installation was easy. It’s been 3 years since I purchased the TMHP I change my filters once a year and have no issues with the system. I must warn you though, RO water is delicious and will spoil you! I can’t drink tap water anymore. Overall I love my TMHP system and would recommend it if you’re looking for clean drinking water.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: The best I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this system for three years now and couldn't be happier with it. The water always flows well, unlike a precious system that I owned. I never run out of water and the taste is perfect. By the way, my calcium and magnesium levels in my blood are excellent. This is the third time, after the years, of replacing the filter elements and it's an easy job. I highly recommend this system.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Works great for well water
customer_reviews.text: Works great for well water. Before my water was undrinkable with how bad it tasted, the filtered water tastes great. There is a sound of the water draining for a short while after using the faucet but it's not too bad. Really is a life changer after buying bottled water for so long. It's so nice being able to have drinking water on tap. The tank seems large enough for a household of two as we've never run into low pressure or anything. I'm planning on buying one for my grandma soon as she also has well water. I would absolutely recommend. Note: I've had the filter installed for almost 2 months as I'm writing this review
customer_reviews.author: B. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great unit, we are happy we chose it!
customer_reviews.text: We had this unit professionally installed, also connecting it to our refrigerator water supply. We were glad we didn't try to do it ourselves, as it took the plumber at least a couple of hours. It works like a charm! Never leaks, great tasting water, good flow rate. We use it for everything--drinking, cooking, watering houseplants. We are now at the 10 month mark and noticing a change in taste...time for a new filter. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: That Girl Said

customer_reviews.title: Best investment you can make!
customer_reviews.text: Better than Voss water, on tap. I purchased the Hyroperfectuon TMHP. The system was almost completely assembled when it arrived. I've never worked with plumbing before but had no issues hooking it up. YouTube has some good instructional videos that show step by step how to do it. The water is the cleanest I've ever had, for someone that drinks water all day this is hands down the best investment. I did test the water and before running through the filter the reading was around 350-400ppm, after filtering I get a steady 25ppm, definitely doing its job!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting clean water!
customer_reviews.text: We have the RO system installed in our kitchen and are delighted with the non toxic water that we can now have available to drink, having previously been using a Brita jug. The taste of the water is good and most importantly we know that we are getting clean drinking water whenever we need it. In terms of the installation - we had it professionally installed as part of our kitchen remodel so cannot speak to how easy it was. At first the system was making a strange gurgling noise but now it has settled down and we barely notice any noise after running the faucet. We are happy with this product and would recommend it to other people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: I like the made in USA part. I can't tell if its all actually made here but I do not buy chinese products if there is an alternative. Once I got familiar with the instructions, it was straightforward. I did purchase a couple right angle fittings to clean up the tubing arrangement but that was easy and my option. I purchased a "non new" model and saved about $100. I would recommend this
customer_reviews.author: mike ball

customer_reviews.title: Clean and safe water.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Home Master Hydroperfection RO system about 2 1/2 months ago. I have a well and the water had a lot of solids and salt. I was hauling drinking water because I was afraid to drink the well water. So I installed the Home Master system. It didn't take long to install. I followed the instructions and it was easy. I didn't need to call tech support for any help. Now I have safe and good tasting drinking water . I'm very happy with my purchase. It will save me a lot of hassle and expense.
customer_reviews.author: Kay & Keith Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and great quality water.
customer_reviews.text: I loved how easy this was to install. Though a little on the pricey side it is definitely worth it in the long wrong. Takes my well water into great tasting drinking water with no problems! No more sulfur tasting well water! I also use it for my potted plants and they seem to love it as well! Great product would definitely recommend it to anyone interested in turning your tap water into clean great tasting water!
customer_reviews.author: Diane W.

customer_reviews.title: No more white dust
customer_reviews.text: I have a humidifier for my plants that does not have filters for the water supply. I have well water and a water softener. This system filters out the chemicals that produce white dust in a humidifier. Plus my indoor plants love the pure clean water. Have had this system for almost two years and it has worked flawlessly ever since I installed it. Best investment I have ever made for my health. Oh and filter replacement is incredibly easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Wacky

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation
customer_reviews.text: The installation is about easy it can get with the use of quick disconnect fittings. I am noticing my family is drinking more water mostly due to better taste. Speed of water flow from the faucet is quick and fast, very nice. Have installed Watts and GE systems in the past. Annual maintenance on them was painful. Honestly I would need to wait to see how it goes with this system. However, use of quick disconnect fitting should make this pretty simple. Not sure if there is much to improve on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Hay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Whilst a bit pricey, this was the perfect solution to get off of bottled water. I am not a stellar handyman, so I had to call (read: live chat) with their support guy—3 times, in fact—, and the direction each time was concise and correct. The only downside of note was that the instructions call for flushing the system twice before using it. The water tasted a bit odd for the first day or so after this, but whatever caused this taste seemed to work itself out through the system, and it has tasted wonderful ever since.
customer_reviews.author: D Willis

customer_reviews.title: Great, well designed system and the water is delicious.
customer_reviews.text: The system is easy to install, comes with very detailed instructions, has quality components and produces very high quality filtered water. All tubing was pre-connected to the filters, ultra violet module and pump. No leaks at all. The water pressure out of the spigot is impressive. Amount of water wasted in the filtration process to produce one gallon of finished product is minimal at 1 to 1. Other systems waste 3 gallons or more to produce 1 gallon. This beats having to constantly buy and lug jugs of water from the store.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic RO system you can install easily. So tasty you will be hooked.
customer_reviews.text: The Home Master HydfroPerfection RO system was simple to install. I did it myself, using simple tools, in about an hour. I ran the output line to our garden and chickens. It amazes me how little emits from this system versus the cheap Brita junk I had tried before this system. Oh, and then there is the TASTE! Everywhere I go, every water I try, even bottled fancy water, is inferior! I long for the water that emits from the tap in my own home. And the filters are cheap!
customer_reviews.author: DBaxter

customer_reviews.title: Great Filtration System
customer_reviews.text: I installed the unit by myself. The instructions were easy enough to follow. I did not use the included sink spout. I ran 25' of 1/4' tubing to my refrigerator for clean cold water and ICE. I really with I would have used 3/8" tubing for better flow. I still need to buy a bypass for my refrigerators filter, so maybe that will help. My wife said she noticed a difference in the taste of the water and I do too. Very clean tasting water. I was sceptical about paying the price, but we have better than bottled water coming out of our frig now. I feel it was worth the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Do it. Good decision
customer_reviews.text: Little difficult to install. The mounts that hold the filter together are cheap and a clusterfrack. Once it is installed you have some of the best water. I could probably charge for this suff, delicious. Worth the effort to install, once that is done you do not have to worry about it for another year, unlike those water bottle subscriptions that do not taste near as good. Do not hesitate, buy it.
customer_reviews.author: hostile

customer_reviews.title: Drink here.
customer_reviews.text: We've had this system for a year and wouldn't part with it. I take a large bottle of water to work everyday that I fill at home because nothing out there tastes better or is more refreshing. It was a breeze to install. We went for a 9 gal tank due to 3 large teenage boys. I even bought their food grade tubing and ran a refrigerator line. No leaks, no fuss. Yes...the knocking sound of the pump can be noticed, but there are methods to mount it with some shock absorbing material between it and the wall to reduce that. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: stu

customer_reviews.title: Great company, excellent water and wonderful customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The best purchase I made. I spent a lot of money buying water( fiji,voss) I confess I had a certain fear and doubts about this filter, I didn't realize it was as good as they said. Anyway, this filter is wonderful, pure water , so much better than Fiji and Voss, ridiculously easy installation (my husband did, guided by online instructions) the faucet fit perfectly. I never had any problems, the system works perfectly! I have this filter for over a year!! I truly recommend this filter, no doubt it was the best purchase I made.
customer_reviews.author: Sibele Mackmillan

customer_reviews.title: The water quality is excellent
customer_reviews.text: I waited 8 months to write this review. This has been an excellent system. I am extremely satisfied with the purchase. We went from a 3 filter system to this system and WOW what an improvement! The water quality of our well isn’t great, this makes our water sooo much better! I would highly recommend this to anyone. The install wasn’t complicated and the quantity of water produced has been highly satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THE TASTE OF MY WATER!
customer_reviews.text: When we moved into our new house the water tasted like garbage. Literally like it was using garbage flavoring. We had someone come out and test our water and recommended a 5500 water filtration system. This product is so much cheaper has all the bells and whistles and actually works. People comment on how good the water is. I would totally buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great product leaks out of UV connector
customer_reviews.text: Edit. They replaced the UV canister for free. I've now owned it for over a year. It works well. Would love the filters to be less expensive. Original. Love the HydroPerfection. The only problem is that it is leaking out of the UV canister (tube has been fully inserted and checked) and out of another area on the product.
customer_reviews.author: Patriot

customer_reviews.title: ... R/O systems beginning in the mid 1980's I am glad to report that I have found the ultimate under ...
customer_reviews.text: Having owned a number of R/O systems beginning in the mid 1980's I am glad to report that I have found the ultimate under sink system for my home. It is by far the the most efficient system that I have owned with delightfully good tasting water as well as a system that works in a dead silent manner and gratefully is easily serviced with easily changed filters. I would definitely recommend this product and would not hesitate in purchasing again should the need arise.
customer_reviews.author: ronald e. brooks

customer_reviews.title: Not working yet - but customer service is working with my installers
customer_reviews.text: Installed last week - did not work ( this is the 3rd one my plumber has installed for me- the first 2 work well- and I know it’s not plumber error since he is very familiar with it). Called the oem - they say it’s a faulty filter and they would send a new one out. It’s been over a week and I haven’t seen it. Not happy with customer service so far!! UPDATE 5/16 - I have been contacted by customer service. There were some miscommunication between my installers and them - they are working on it right now and I hope to bump it up to a 5 star once it’s working !! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lara Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We are using Home Master TMHP Hydro Perfection filter for not even a month now. So far, we are very satisfied. Filtrated water quality is excellent. It was delivered really fast. Installation was not hard at all, but you need to be at least somewhat handy with small plumbing work. I already recomended this filter to a couple of people.
customer_reviews.author: spring_nyc

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and great costumer service also.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this USA product. Works perfect, water tastes great. Once I registered my warranty they called me to offer help if I need some information because I installed the filter by my self. Super nice and kind. This version is worth every penny. I don’t have to buy plastic bottles anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like fresh spring water!
customer_reviews.text: I found the documentation easy to understand and follow, and the system easy enough to install, so I credit the tech support writer(s) for that. We use the system for drinking and cooking water, and also used it this summer to water our vegetable garden. The water tastes fresh and flavorful (our cats like it too), and our tomatoes and peppers have been large, tasty and prolific. It's nice to know we're watering our vegetables free of both chlorine and fluoride, as well as chemicals like PFAS in the water supply that aren't even monitored.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable source of safe water
customer_reviews.text: With all the uncertainties currently in the world, its great to know my family has a reliable source of safe, great tasting water whenever we want it. I was a bit apprehensive before making the purchase, but now that we have used the system for several months, I continue to recommend it to my friends and family. I’ve bought a lot of stuff for our home and family; this water purification system ranks among the best purchase I have ever made. The key reasons for purchase were 1) less trips out to buy bottled water and 2) eliminate the hard water scale buildup in our humidifiers. I highly recommend this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W.

customer_reviews.title: The water quality is worth it
customer_reviews.text: We love the quality of the water and are kicking ourselves because we didn't buy it sooner. The tech services are fantastic and you can have an actual persson to help you. We found the YouTube video was really helpful. The only down side is we had to purchase a $50 drill bit to drill through the sink and we needed an extension cord because our power outlet was far away.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnette Lauenroth

customer_reviews.title: Used for over a year now and still works great!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great quality system that was easy to install. I installed this over a year ago and just replaced the first set of filters. It has continued to work excellent!! It has a high flow and easily keeps up with our family of six.
customer_reviews.author: higgins

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy install, quality all the way!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this system for my wife because she drinks water all day long and we were in a rural location with unknown water quality. It was easy to install and operated flawlessly. When we moved back to the mountains I disconnected the system and installed it again, this time replacing the filters and, again, absolutely no problems with the installation. I fill jugs to take to the office for cold drinking, coffee and tea. I'm giving a five star rating only because it doesn't go any higher.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful RO System
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this system in June of 2015. to replace our old kitchen RO system because of its features and great reviews. We definitely made the right choice. It is so much better than what we had before. The unit operates flawlessly and is very quiet, a nice plus. Our water is delicious and the tank refills quickly. Would definitely recommend. Plus the customer service is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: LifedesignAngel

customer_reviews.title: Well Look at that?! I have clean water!
customer_reviews.text: I read the instructions twice, they are clear and concise. I was able to install the filter set up and get clean water running within an hour. And makes me feel good that this product is made in America. I was able to test with my dissolved solids tester and my water is indeed very clean. Before the filter 450 ppm after the filter 50 ppm! It works!
customer_reviews.author: Lemon Party

customer_reviews.title: It also seems like there is much less waste water produced
customer_reviews.text: This thing puts our old RO system to shame. It produces water at least twice as quickly & flows out of the spout twice as quickly as well. It's also quieter than our old one & with the pump. It also seems like there is much less waste water produced. (Eye ball/gut not Scientific) You can look down the drain with a flashlight & see the waste water dripping. The water tastes better too. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick C. Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: Taste and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Have had this unit for 2 years now and it has operated flawlessly. Great tasting water and quick rejuvenation . I installed it myself , easy to install ( except for crawling under the sink .) I would highly recommend this unit and do to all my friends and colleagues in the construction industry.
customer_reviews.author: kiwim8

customer_reviews.title: Drinking more water now
customer_reviews.text: The taste of this filtered water is great! My son & his wife got this system and I always noticed how much I enjoyed drinking water at their house. I had another filter system at my house, but my water just didn't seem as good. Now mine is just as nice and refreshing! Since we had very little space under our sink, we had a plumber install the unit. Unfortunately this person had some trouble, but with a few calls to Tech Support and watching some online videos from the company, it all got figured out. Great customer service if you need it. The best tasting water!!
customer_reviews.author: VB Mom

customer_reviews.title: Better than Bottled
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I was really nervous about making the switch from bottled water to a water filtration system, but now I’m kicking myself for not doing it sooner. The water tastes just as good, if not better, than the crazy expensive Essentia water I’d been drinking. I could not be more relieved that I will be saving tons of money and helping the environment at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: rotten

customer_reviews.title: Excellent system.
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit difficult to install as my house plumbing was different from the kit that came with the system. A couple of trips to Lowes, however, and it is now installed and working great. I did buy a different faucet the included faucet is chrome and my kitchen has bronze fixtures. Other than that, it is working well. I tested the water (I have a full water testing kit as I keep salt water aquariums) and the water tested perfect. Our area has high nitrates due to agriculture and this system removed all of them.
customer_reviews.author: B. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water
customer_reviews.text: This was a great solution for drinking water on my well system that contained some iron, a little odor, and who knows how much bacteria from time to time. Many RO systems can filter, not all also contain a UV light to got that extra step in sanitation. The output quality is excellent, so we no longer purchase bottled water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great water filter system!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with our system - the water tastes great! Having a tank of purified water is awesome - as big water drinkers, we never deal with slow flow unless we use all of the water at one time (which is rare). The installation can be intimidating but with a little patience, you can do it. Their customer service is second to none - I've always been directly connected to a tech whenever I've had any issue, and they'll walk you through anything (installation, filter changes, troubleshooting, etc) thoroughly and patiently. I also love that I only have to change the filters once a year. The system is expensive but you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: hillkil

customer_reviews.title: Great product. After a year
customer_reviews.text: Great product. After a year, the system provides great water. The only down side (if you can call it a "down side") is that first thing in the morning after no use overnight, the water comes out warm, but in itself, this in itself is good as it is a good indication that the ultraviolet light is working correctly. Very easy to install. Have not regretted one bit buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: MDS

customer_reviews.title: The system works well and was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I am a reasonably handy Guy, but I think even a novice could install this system without much difficulty. The instructions are straightforward and clear. There are several videos online that are also helpful. Installation took several hours as I was also installing a new faucet. Once completed, and after flushing, the system has worked flawlessly. Very good water quality and excellent taste (which is to say really no taste at all). It is amazing how accustomed we become to the smells and tastes of "regular" city water. I have had several RO systems, and this is by far the best I have used. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ron M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome system that does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I recently discovered that our drilled well had uranium and bacteria issues. we decided to buy this unit specifically because it had the UV light and premate pump included, and because of the easy change filter system. It was easy to install if you have basic skills and follow the instructions. Best of all, we have re-tested our drinking water from the unit with an independant lab and the water is now PERFECT. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy K

customer_reviews.title: Water-thrifty, reverse-osmosis water
customer_reviews.text: We bought this water filter after much research. It was important to us to conserve as much water as possible and this is one of the best. We also liked the good reviews and the thorough filtration and re-mineralizing feature. Everything came neatly packed with very clear instructions. We did upgrade the faucet. It took a couple of hours to install and we were up and running with clean filtered water that tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: katrina godshalk

customer_reviews.title: Best water ever
customer_reviews.text: Better than bottled water, flows very fast about 1/2 the speed of the main faucet. Water tastes great, best I've ever had. The only thing I didn't like was how tangled up the filters were. When they assembled this thing at the manufacturer, they interlaced the hoses which made mounting it harder than it needed to be. Hopefully when I replace the filters I'll be able to reroute the lines.
customer_reviews.author: Jumping Beaver

customer_reviews.title: we stopped going to the water purifier store as the TMHP treated water has a much better TDS reading
customer_reviews.text: We used to buy water from a neighborhood water purifier every week because we live in an area where the TDS reading from the tap water is closed to 230. Ever since we bought the TMHP, we stopped going to the water purifier store as the TMHP treated water has a much better TDS reading. And the water taste great. We did hire a contractor to install the system though because we had to drill holes through our countertop. We strongly advise getting the system. Nowadays, you can't really trust your local water company on serving you the best possible quality of water. Our national water standard is some of the lowest among those of the developed nation.
customer_reviews.author: Attiya

customer_reviews.title: Made our water GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: It was straightforward to install. There was full support from the company, and there was stray parts that you could get from the manufacturer, too. In our case more of the anti-microbial hose
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Blakeslee

customer_reviews.title: Best RO System for the money, water tastes perfect, just like it should
customer_reviews.text: Installation was a breeze, easier than it looks. Hardest part was putting a hole in the sink for the spout; a borer bit did the trick. The water’s taste is sweet and pure, as good as the best bottled water. The company has consistently offered support without being intrusive, offered email discounts on replacement filters, and the unit has so far performed flawlessly for almost three years. Water flow slows down a little around a year into the filters, then returns to full pressure once they are changed. Only gripe is that I paid nearly twice what they are selling for now on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: B. D.

customer_reviews.title: Great RO system with Easy Installation
customer_reviews.text: Great RO filtration system with easy installation. The manual could use some pictures or diagrams to make the installation easier. However the online video made the installation a snap. PLEASE NOTE: Amazon suggests the ISpring refrigerator connection kit for this unit. It does not fit. The Home Master uses a 3/8" water line so you will need a 3/8" by 1/4" by 3/8" tee.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Stop searching.  This is THE ONE
customer_reviews.text: Look I am not a great handyman but I was able to do this myself. But I did call customer service and they were very helpful when I had a question during install. You want this one because: 1. Water flow is crazy fast! 2. Water quality is top notch. Had it checked. 3. Taste is excellent with their remineralization stage. 4. Customer support will be there for you
customer_reviews.author: p stark

customer_reviews.title: Water taste great !!
customer_reviews.text: I have a newborn and want to make sure I have the best filtration system possible. I did my research and ended up purchasing this system. After a year of usage, I have not encounter any problems. I am very happy with the unit so far. Water flow was good, no leaking, good clean quality water, and most importantly water taste great. I highly recommend this system to anyone looking for a under sink water filtration system.
customer_reviews.author: Maomaosmile

customer_reviews.title: Checks all the boxes.
customer_reviews.text: Great system, great customer service, easy install, great tasting water. Installed in the rv and could not be happier. Thanks Perfect Water.
customer_reviews.author: fl_hillbilly

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic product! I installed myself to replace a Culligan system I had. This system could not be simpler. It has been about 5 months now. The taste of the water is amazing! When I drink a name brand bottled water it tastes terrible compared to the water this system produces. I very happy and highly recommend this unit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fiji water from your tap!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this going for only a month so far, but wow we love this system. It is amazing and tastes amazing too. Not the simplest install, but pretty straight forward. We had one small leak that was easy to fix just by pushing the hose in a little harder. 9.8/10 so far in all categories.
customer_reviews.author: tfunk02

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Guy finally made it over to install on Mothers Day and less than a month later it stopped giving us water. Im a single mom and saved for this for 2 years and now i just threw away 435,18 cents. So very frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie C. Splattstoesser

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best investment we have made in a long time. With a family of 6, drinking bottled water was becoming increasingly expensive and half the time, only half the bottle was consumed before the kids would confuse whose water bottle was whose. Frustrating and wasteful. This has eliminated all of that! The water tastes much better than store bought bottled water and no longer worried about bpa's leaching into our water. I did by 48 oz bpa free water bottles by Nalgene on Amazon so hubby and kids could carry to school/work. Installation was easy and straightforward. Hubby completed in about 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: mamaof4boys

customer_reviews.title: So great I bought it twice.
customer_reviews.text: We just moved and this is the first purchase I made for my new home. I had installed it previously at my old house and it worked great for over a year before the TDS started to rise and I replaced the filter. This time I installed it and my TDS went from 270PPM back to 35 just like my last system. I even installed the Home Master whole home system to pre filter chlorine and further enhance filter life.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Home Master RO System Improves Drinking Water Quality
customer_reviews.text: Installation was straightforward. If you have moderate home improvements skills you can install this system yourself. A plumber would find the installation a piece of cake. Just make sure you have enough room under the sink and a place to mount the RO faucet on top of the sink. The results are amazing. Greatly improved water quality for drinking and food prep are at your finger tips. Make sure you order the high flow option. I am very pleased with this system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TMHP HydroPerfection
customer_reviews.text: Great product. High quality. Easy to install. After installation I had a minor issue with the product. I emailed customer support and minutes later I received a call from Will Diaz a service manager. Outstanding technical support they will work with you to get your issue solved quickly. I highly recommend home Master products to friends, family and all!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: James Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Home Master TMHP Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It’s about a week now. Home Master TMHP is doing awesome so far, and I did no mistake in choosing this over other top brands in the market. Definitely recommend. I will keep close eye and update more information going forward.
customer_reviews.author: NewUser

customer_reviews.title: RO-132 Water Filter System
customer_reviews.text: I have now had this unit for 1.5 years and we love it. After all this time, we are still using the original filters and the test readings are still in the teens. The installation was straight forward, looks good in the cabinet, water tastes great, and the pressure pump provides good pressure in dispensing the filtered water. I even had a non-installation question that I emailed them on a Sunday during a holiday and received an answer within 1 hour. Great customer service. Jay
customer_reviews.author: JKG

customer_reviews.title: unit leaks
customer_reviews.text: had a professional hook it up water leaks everywhere. I want to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Art B.

customer_reviews.title: which was a great unit but cost 3 times as much as the ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit to replace my Kinetico RO system, which was a great unit but cost 3 times as much as the Home Master. I have to say I like the Home Master a ton better. I makes RO water at a significantly faster pace, includes a UV (not included with Kinetico), and the replacement filters are significantly less expensive. I would highly recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: B D Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Easy install for DIY’er. Water taste great
customer_reviews.text: We are on a well and looking for an nice under cabinet filter. The install was very straight forward. The online videos from manufacturers site were helpful. I had to drill a new hole through granite which took an extra 10-15 minutes. I found drill bit for granite on amazon for $20 that worked well. The only other challenge was installing a new outlet under the sink. I was able to tap into power from an outlet close by. Otherwise the UV light would have no power. Overall very easy to install and working great. I’d recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian little.

customer_reviews.title: faucet is the weakest link.
customer_reviews.text: Needs a diagram of how hoses connect to each other (in the system itself) but we finally figured it out. Must be very careful with included faucet, as it is not very sturdy. System works great, providing plenty of water on demand.
customer_reviews.author: OneStepp

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend working with Home Master via Perfect Water Technologies
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend working with Home Master via Perfect Water Technologies. We purchased the HydroPerfection unit as it adds minerals back into the reverse osmosis water via a mineral cartridge. Upon installation we had a couple small issues. One call to Perfect Water (manufacture of the HydroPerfection RO unit, US Made by the way), within a couple minutes the tech had the issue resolved. Water taste is amazing, and the fact you are getting the needed minerals back in your water is a great plus. Thank you Tim and Will at Perfect Water, amazing demonstration of customer service. This unit has a 5 year warranty, also a huge plus. Price might be a little higher than other rev
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it and would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this system for more than a year and this is the third RO system I have installed (three different homes). There are plenty of less expensive systems on the market and I have owned them. This is by far the best system I have owned and would buy it again. The water quality is delicious and it produces plenty of water. We have never run low or out of RO water. We use it for drinking, cooking and washing produce. For me the installation was easy. Do your research and plan the installation and it will be easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great RO for well water.
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this RO. Great tasting water. Highly recommended for homes with a well. UPDATE: 2019-02-11 We moved about one year after the purchase of this Home Master TMHP. Our new home didn't have an RO water system, so we bought *another* Home Master TMHP, without any hesitation. Easy to install, great tasting water, and a reliable product. We are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Robb

customer_reviews.title: We love this system
customer_reviews.text: We got the HomeMaster system as part of a major kitchen remodel. We've been using it for about 2 months and love it. I was reluctant to get a filtration system because I thought our water tasted fine, but my other half --who's very health conscious--prevailed. To my surprise our water noticeably tastes better with the new system. In addition to the taste, we like all the "cooties" that it filters out plus adding necessary minerals back into the water that other systems remove but don't replace. I recommend it without› reservation.
customer_reviews.author: GTC

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and delicious tasting water!
customer_reviews.text: The Home Master Hydroperfection RO system is the best on the market. Customer service was amazing and it was easy to install. Our water tastes great. My family no longer needs to buy bottled water. We fill our reusable water bottles with delicious tasting, clean, filtered water. Fewer plastic bottle usage is much better for the environment too!
customer_reviews.author: Sascha F.

customer_reviews.title: but we aren't very handy so thought it'd be best to hire someone else
customer_reviews.text: Complex to put together, we had to hire a plumber to put it in. Apparently there are videos online you can look at to figure out how to install, but we aren't very handy so thought it'd be best to hire someone else. But now that we have it in, it's easy to use and we love it! And the water tastes great! The company HydroPerfection called me just to check up on how I liked the product. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: 3by

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best! Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a dialysis nurse and know the importance of water filtration systems. This system is superb from the reverse osmosis to the ultraviolet light usage to the 1:1 water waste/use amount....and our city water was rating 275 prior and 21 after. My 5 dogs deserve the purest, best tasting water and so do we! So happy I found this system and company!! I did upgrade to the antimicrobial tubing.
customer_reviews.author: SAleks

customer_reviews.title: The water tastes great and I have peace of mind that the family ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why we haven't installed a water filtration system until now. The water tastes great and I have peace of mind that the family is safe from all the toxins in tap water.
customer_reviews.author: ASCA

customer_reviews.title: Love this RO system
customer_reviews.text: Love this RO system. When my family comes to the house, they love to use it. Very nice product and very easy to install tank under my sink. Which the tank can be chilled. Guess I could hook this up to my refrigerator to provide cold RO water. Its cold enough to drink. Fill our water bottle up every day to take which out.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love It! Water tastes like Fiji water
customer_reviews.text: Tested water afterwards...ppm of 25 was better or equivalent to paid water service at home. Water spout has fantastic pressure. Water tastes great and has wonderful minerals in it. The true honest compliment is that the kids love it. We wash our veggies and cook with the water as well.I have also recommended it to 2 other family members and it is performing well in their households.
customer_reviews.author: VJ Consulting

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I got the hydroperfection because it is the best model and if you’re spending the money to get safe water, you might as well spend a fraction more for top of the line. Install was easy and there are plenty of videos online to help. Overall, we’re very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Timpy

customer_reviews.title: Water taste great, Ice cubes looks great, and TDS of around 105ppm
customer_reviews.text: This system works great. I installed it in the water circuit going to the fridge. Water taste great, Ice cubes looks great, and TDS of around 105ppm. I couldn't of asked for better.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting water
customer_reviews.text: I did long research about all these filters and bought this one. I don't regret it. I did a blind test for taste and it beat all other waters I've ever drank. Knowing that it also does it's job right is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Boutin

customer_reviews.title: widely acknowledged to be the best...
customer_reviews.text: Reverse osmosis systems are widely acknowledged to be the best home water filtration systems, and this one is, per our research, among the very best of those. Installation took me a couple hours, but I was being very methodical to get it right the first time without issues. Following the manufacturer's installation video was extremely helpful. The improvement in quality to our drinking was immediately noticeable. After a year's use I'm certain this system has been a plus for my family's health and well-being.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Worth every Penny, Very much satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love the taste. Very clear installation manual how to connect.
customer_reviews.author: venkata surya

customer_reviews.title: Satisfaction!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted and easy to install. Used the step by step videos on their site. Definitely would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Not easy
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to install. Plan on a few hours to learn what to do then 8 hours to install
customer_reviews.author: nicholas morello

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic RO system with great water taste and peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I installed this water system myself over a year ago replacing a water system that the family kept complaining about. My daughter thought that the old water gave her headaches. Despite our water quality out of the tap being low the water tastes great and everyone in our extended family really likes it. It is hard to say whether the filter helped with the headaches, but the timing of us installing the water system coincided with a significant reduction in the headaches. In any event, the filter is easy to install, great quality, and the water tastes fantastic. The re-mineralization seems to make a difference in the water taste. I would highly recommend this filter and this company.
customer_reviews.author: California
